gold.user: User requests to list all SIP credentials associated with a specific Credential List in their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of SIP credentials in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to create a new SIP credential with a username and password for a specific Credential List.
gold.ideal: Creates a new SIP credential and returns the details of the created credential in JSON format.

gold.user: User requests to fetch details of a specific SIP credential using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified SIP credential in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to update an existing SIP credential's username and password.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified SIP credential and returns the updated details in JSON format.

gold.user: User requests to delete a specific SIP credential using its SID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified SIP credential and returns a success message.
